body_html:
@ChristianF88 Hi, Would you please do these things in a whole?

conda activate pyto
conda install tbb
set CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\Library\include
set LIB=C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\Library\lib;C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\envs\pyto\Library\lib;%LIB%

And then it should work.

conda install tbb

body:
@ChristianF88 Hi, Would you please do these things in a whole?
```cmd
conda activate pyto
conda install tbb
set CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\Library\include
set LIB=C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\Library\lib;C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\envs\pyto\Library\lib;%LIB%
```
And then it should work.
